info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

[ {Hey #0, #0. By any chance, is there a little chubby baby pig in this place? Oh, it’s nothing important. He was my friend, I just want to see how he’s doing nowadays.}, {Oh little #0, will you open the door, please? I won’t hurt anyone, I swear it. I’m just a little bit hungry.}, {#0, I’ll give you something good if you let me out!}, {I am a big bad wolf, I’ll gobble you all up and get out of this place!}, {#0, I’m telling this secret only to you. If you ever build a house, make it a sturdy brick house.} ]

collection.name: Big and Might be Bad Wolf
Big and Will be Bad Wolf
collection.openText: Still, it didn’t matter to him. After all, he was “destined” to be a big bad wolf.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When #0, carrying the scent of F-01-57 from their previous work, completed the work process, the Qliphoth Counter decreased. #0 was then devoured by $0.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased. Subsequently, #0 was devoured by $0.
When an Instinct work process was completed with $0 while its abdomen was noticeably enlarged, all previously consumed employees were orally voided.
When a subject who suffered bleeding by aggression from F-01-57 entered the hallway leading to the containment unit of $0, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When F-01-57 entered the hallway leading to $0’s containment unit, the Qliphoth Counter immediately became zero.
Some employees reported that they heard a voice coming from the stomach of $0. Rescue should be possible after suppression when it escapes. It may be possible to contract help from F-01-57.
